data.actual_result: You can insert as many characters as you want, pushing the wumpus off screen
data.expected_result: Text should stopped being added or a error saying that it "Must be 32 characters or  less"
data.short_description: There's no character limit in the add friend screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the add friend option - On the search friend screen open the keyboard - insert more than 32 characters
